alpha: Must contain only the characters a-z, or A-Z
creditCard: Must be a valid credit card number
creditCardExpiry: Must be a valid credit card expiry date
cvv: Must be a valid ccv card number
email: Must be a valid email address
greaterThanEqual: Must be greater than or equal to ${1}
hexColor: Must be a valid RGB color hex
int: Must be a valid while number
length: Must be between ${1} and ${2} characters long
lessThanOrEqual: Must be less than or equal to ${1}
passwordLength: Must be between 6 and 40 characters long.
passwordAlpha: Must contain at least one alpha character (a-z, A-Z)
passwordNum: Must contain at least one numeric character (0-9)
slug: Must contain only the characters a-z, 0-9, or -, and between ${1} and ${2} characters long
